definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

acupuncture point (any point on any meridian)/category of 12 specific acupuncture points near the wrist or ankle, each lying on a different meridian (one of five categories collectively termed 五輸穴|五输穴)
(literary) hip bone/(TCM) space between two joints
Quchi acupoint LI11, at the lateral end of the elbow crease
to leave an inserted needle in place for a period of time (acupuncture)
location on wrist over the radial artery where pulse is taken in TCM
(TCM) the three truncal cavities (thoracic, abdominal and pelvic), known as the "triple heater" or "San Jiao"
